https://tmrev.io/movie/1034777-Carma 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A man is abducted and held hostage in his car by 3 members of a dangerous gang, led by a vicious psychopath. But what appears to be a straight-forward kidnapping turns out to be an intricate tale of deception, vengeance and retribution. Each progressive scene during the kidnapping is linked with impactful scenes from the past, producing a cohesive non-linear story that ends with a series of mind-boggling, yet ultimately satisfying, twists. Carma
